explains: n. 庆典，庆祝活动；庆祝，颂扬；宗教仪式的举行

sentences.en: A wedding is a joyful celebration of love.
sentences.cn: 婚礼是令人喜悦的爱情庆典。

sentences.en: Another celebration had drawn to its close.
sentences.cn: 另一个庆典已经结束了。

sentences.en: She wanted the celebration to be a simple family affair.
sentences.cn: 她希望庆祝活动仅限于家人参加。
